name: Mythical Pumpkins
description:
Mythical Pumpkins is a bullet hell-styled game inspired by games such as "Just Shapes and Beats" by Berzerk Studio. 

Fight off Gods and listen to some epic electronic music, while being a... pumpkin. Dodge bullets, swords, laser beams and see if you can survive until the song ends!

Original soundtrack at BandLab:

https://www.bandlab.com/gamerulez_official/albums/8e77f9b6-f717-ec11-981f-0004ff...

NOTE: Only one song has been fully implemented. The two others will be implemented in the near future.
